invite.subject: Welcome to Azulfy - Your Invitation to Join
invite.introduction: You have been invited to join our platform as a
invite.introduction_2: To get started, please find your temporary password below.
invite.introduction_3: Be sure to change it upon your first login for security purposes.
invite.store_description: For an even better experience, download our native app available on the App Store and Google Play Store. Just click the images below to download the app on your device.
invite.footer_1: If you have any questions or need assistance, do not hesitate to contact our support team at
invite.footer_2: We are looking forward to seeing you on Azulfy!

forget_password.introduction: You have requested to reset your password. Please click the button below to reset your password.
forget_password.footer_1: If you did not request a password reset, no further action is required.
